short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Indian independent, Arthouse and Auteur Films

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DearCinema.com is oldest and largest Indian website that exclusively covers Indian Independent, Arthouse and Auteur films. Started in 2007, DearCinema.com is widely followed by filmmakers, film enthusiasts, film students and festival goers.
